ModMetaData.name: Gunplay
ModMetaData.author: AUTOMATIC
ModMetaData.description:
Adds more cinematic effects to ranged weapons: - long trails for projectiles - weapon animations for miniguns and bows - projectiles comes from thew barrel of the gun and not from inside of the colonist. - weapon movement animation for pawns missing their targets - different sounds for some weapons - visual effects for particle collision - faster projectile speed for all projectiles
You can choose which changes you want in mod settings.
